scripts.pack: npm run pack-mac && npm run pack-win-ia32 && npm run pack-win-x64
scripts.pack-mac: rimraf builds && electron-packager . --platform darwin --arch x64 --ignore ".*\.zip" --out builds && electron-installer-zip builds/*-darwin-x64 mac.zip
scripts.pack-win-ia32: rimraf builds && electron-packager . --platform win32 --arch ia32 --ignore ".*\.zip" --out builds && electron-installer-zip builds/*-win32-ia32 win32.zip
scripts.pack-win-x64: rimraf builds && electron-packager . --platform win32 --arch x64 --ignore ".*\.zip" --out builds && electron-installer-zip builds/*-win32-x64 win64.zip
